snippet.title: Song Of Horror: Deluxe Edition - Official Trailer (2021)
snippet.description:
New Game Trailers 2021!

Coming to PS4 and Xbox One on May 28th 2021. This game is also available on PC via Steam.

This is a special boxed edition that is published by and distributed by Meridiem Games. It will be availale this summer for PlayStation 4.

A 3rd person, fixed-camera survival horror adventure. Fear the Presence, a mysterious entity you cannot fight: stay alert, hide, breathe slowly... Explore cursed places where unseen spirits and lost souls linger in a true horror story for the ages. 

Stay informed on all the latest game releases, newest trailers, upcoming games, indie games and gameplay!

Game Trailers 2021 PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PC, Nintendo Switch
